5.0.0: Added: Compatibility for WordPress 4.7 and PHP 7.
5.0.1: Added: Option to replace imported CSV file value with static and dynamic value.
5.0.2: Added: Image image import from external URL
5.0.3: Added: Send email to newly imported User with Password Information.
5.0.4: Added: Any Custom Post Type import.
5.0.5: Added: Post Type import with terms & taxonomies with any depth of parent-child hierarchy.
5.0.6: Added: Migration for the following versions 4.0.0, 4.1.0, 4.4.0 and 4.5.
5.0.7: Improved: High speed import with enhanced UI.
5.0.8: Improved: User role import with capability value or role name in CSV.

5.0.1.0: Fixed: WP Customer Reviews import feature.

5.0.2.1: Todo Added: For handling the log file whether exists or not.

5.0.3.0: Added: Support for traditional Chinese characters.
5.0.3.1: Fixed: Canonical URL support on All in One SEO data import.
5.0.3.5: Fixed: [Custom taxonomies are mixed up while assign a single term to the posts](https://wordpress.org/support/topic/version-5-03-issues/)
5.0.3.6: Fixed: All of a sudden all the custom fields present in the WP installation are added to each single post, even if they are empty;
5.0.3.7: Fixed: Inline image support. ( Supports all external URL )
5.0.3.8: Fixed: All of the posts are now being added the following without need, before post content
5.0.3.9: Removed: Custom capabilities from the roles to access the plugins. ( Administrator, Author, Editor )
5.0.3.10: Applied: iCheck style to allow author / editor option.
5.0.3.11: Added: Validation on Enquiry & Newsletter Subscription forms.
5.0.3.13: Modified: Plugin action links instead of plugin row meta.

5.1.1: Moved: All helper class files under helpers directory.
5.1.2: Added: WebService for all the available features.
5.1.3: Fixed: PODS fields registration issue using API.
5.1.4: Fixed: Export user fields issue for Toolset types plugin.
5.1.5: Fixed: wp_page_template field import issue on import Pages.
5.1.6: Removed: Warnings in plugin row meta information.
5.1.7: Fixed: Widget not appeared for ACF Repeater fields while using ACF Pro add-on.
5.1.9: Removed: Unwanted DOCTYPE wrapper while import the inline images for post content.
5.1.12: Fixed: Thumbnail generation issue on import featured images.
5.1.13: Fixed: Featured image support for WooCommerce & MarketPress Variations.
5.1.14: Fixed: Yoast SEO import support for Terms & Taxonomies.
5.1.15: Fixed: Issue on exporting Yoast SEO data for Post types & Taxonomies.
5.1.16: Fixed: External URL support ( If having space in the path ).
5.1.17: Fixed: WooCommerce product type import ( Simple, Grouped, External, Variation, Simple Subscription & Variable Subscription ).
5.1.18: Fixed: WooCommerce product meta information import.
5.1.19: Fixed: post_category and post_tag export issue.
5.1.20: Fixed: Users custom fields not shown in Mapping Section which is created by ACF Pro.
5.1.21: Fixed: Broken when SCRIPT_DEBUG is true. [Solved](https://wordpress.org/support/topic/broken-when-script_debug-is-true/).
5.1.22: Fixed: Warnings in prepare statements (when SCRIPT_DEBUG is true).
5.1.23: Fixed: Issue in File manager, When switching the revisions.
5.1.24: Fixed: Issues in import multiple images & multiple files on ACF Pro Repeater field.
5.1.25: Fixed: ACF free image field & file field import.
5.1.27: Removed: Unwanted widget fields for WPeCommerce Coupons.
5.1.28: Added: Notice for enable the wp-cron to populate the featured images.
5.1.29: Added: Warning for Exceeded file size csv.
5.1.30: Fixed: Issue on exporting Categories and Tags.
5.1.31: Fixed: Issue while import post type with post ID's.
5.1.32: Added: Restriction for WP dashboard charts to the user who have the role Author & Editor.
5.1.33: Fixed: Export Issue for Events,Event recurring and locations in Events Manager plugin.
5.1.35: Removed: Console warnings on Mapping section.

5.2.0: Added: Advanced mapping section with easy drag ’n’ drop.
5.2.2: Fixed: Import & Export ACF Pro repeater fields. ( Tested upto ACF Pro version - 5.5.10 ).
5.2.3: Added: Latest version support on Yoast SEO 4.4
5.2.4: Added: Latest version support on All In One SEO 2.3.12.1
5.2.5: Added: Latest version support on Toolset Types 2.2.8
5.2.6: Added: Latest version support on PODS 2.6.8
5.2.7: Added: Latest version support on WP-Members 3.1.6.3
5.2.8: Added: Latest version support on WPeCommerce 3.12.0
5.2.9: Added: Latest version support on MarketPress Lite 3.2
5.2.10: Added: WPML support for the latest version 3.6.3.
5.2.11: Fixed: Naming issue while registering third party custom fields from mapping section.

5.3.0: Added: CMB2 & Custom Field Suite plugin support.
5.3.2: Added: Duplicate handling in ACF image import.
5.3.4: Added: Maintainance mode and rollback option.
5.3.6: Improved: Mapping session maintainance without data loss.
5.3.8: Improved: Import serialized data in CSV.
5.3.10: Improved: Import Post title with special characters
5.3.12: Fixed: Comment import, duplicate handling, advanced mapping, ACF repeater field and reference tag in content.

5.4.0: Added: Import, Update and Schedule XML import.
5.4.1: Advanced mapping in XML with Table and Tree view.
5.4.2: Added: New API to import/update with mapping template.
5.4.3: Fixed: Export users created in specific period.
5.4.4: Fixed: Send email on new user import.
5.4.5: Fixed: Events Manager & Customer Review advanced mapping support.
5.4.6: Fixed: Mapping data loss with advanced mapping in CSV Import.

5.5.0: Added: support for Toolset Pro 3.1.1 & Free 2.3.4
5.5.1: Added: support for ACF plugin version 5.7.7
5.5.2: Added: support for multiple parent relationship import.
5.5.3: Fixed: ACF Repeater custom fields not appearing under the mapping section.
5.5.4: Fixed: ACF Pro Repeater field export.
5.5.5: Fixed: Automatically updating  password on user import.

6.0.1: Added: Image import from computer along with the Alt text & description
6.0.2: Added: Schedule Import/Export based on their UTC time zone,admins will be notified on the Import or Export in emails in their local time.
6.0.4: Improved:  Better handling of Images from 3rd party plugins
6.0.5: Added: Header Manipulation fields can now hold static text content along with any CSV header content.
6.0.7: Modified: Import log section with progress bar and time ellapsed
6.0.10: Added: WPML support for the latest version 4.2.5
6.0.12: Added: Export download section with progress bar and time ellapsed
6.0.13: Added: Export support for toolset repeatable field group,multiple relationships,intermediate relationship.
6.0.14: Modified: import log section with progress bar and time ellapsed
6.0.15: Added: support for latest woocommerce(3.6.5) fields
6.0.16: Added: complete import support for CMB2 2.3.0
6.0.17: Added: Displays total number of records to be exported
6.0.18: Schedule Export  based on their UTC time zone. And Admins will be notified on the Import or Export in emails in their local time
6.0.20: Added export download section with progress bar and time ellapsed
6.0.21: Added:Export support  for latest woocommerce fields
6.0.23: Added: WPML export support for post,page,custom posts,woocommerce-product,categories,tags
6.0.24: Added: Export support for toolset repeatable field group,multiple relationships,intermediate relationship.
6.0.25: Fixed: issues in file from server
6.0.26: Added: Progress bar for desktop upload
6.0.27: Added: Separate widget for Nextgen gallery,WPML,Events manager,WooCommerce Orders, Refunds and Coupons
6.0.28: fixed: Drag and Drop Section supports import of static text along with CSV headers.
6.0.29: Added: Separate Media Upload Section for uploading bulk Images.

6.0.2.0: Completely added RTL Support for Right to Left Languages css
6.0.2.1: Fixed issue - display acf group and repeater field values to front-end
6.0.2.2: Fixed: Download log issue with image import
6.0.2.3: Fixed: Custom post with product category import
6.0.2.5: Fixed: Custom post with product-cat export
6.0.2.6: Cleared warnings while enabling debug mode
6.0.2.7: Added: Support for google drive images

6.0.3.0: Improved bulk import handling without memory update
6.0.3.1: Import post_content image without downloaded into media
6.0.3.2: Added: Post Content editor in drag and drop mode

6.0.4.1: Fixed: Email validation in support form

6.0.5.0: Added: media upload option in drag and drop section
6.0.5.1: Fixed: xml import issue with custom-posts
6.0.5.2: Fixed: woocommerce chained product import issue
6.0.5.3: Fixed: third party plugin widget & import problem in multisite
6.0.5.6: Fixed: Event categories import from recurring events
6.0.5.8: Fixed: Default custom fields supports with , delimiter

6.1.0: Added: Import,update and export support for bbpress.(Forum,Topic,Reply)

6.1.2: Added: Export support  for table field and product relationship field in pods
6.1.3: Added: Import & export support for custom post parent & menu_order
6.1.4: Added: Export based on specific category
6.1.5: Added: Existing image import supports with attachment_id
6.1.6: Added: Import and export support for comments reply.
6.1.7: Fixed: Comments import with acf fields
6.1.8: Fixed: Ftp and Url based schedule update
6.1.9: Fixed: Nextgen gallery zip image import issue
6.1.10: Fixed: Toolset all type widget issue
6.1.11: Added: Filename import for pods and acf fields
6.1.14: Modified: Nested category delimiter from -> to >
6.1.15: Fixed: Pods multiple pick list issue
6.1.16: Fixed: repeater field post_object import and export using post_title
6.1.17: Fixed: Added more than one header with xml and drag and drop import
6.1.18: Fixed: Location and ticket export in Events manager
6.1.19: Fixed: Import and export support for ACF relationship fields

6.2.1: Added: Seperate Media Handling for post content images
6.2.2: Added: Import support for LearnPress-LMS plugin:Courses,Lessons,Quizzes,Orders and Questions
6.2.3: Added: Update based on ACF Pro and Free number and text field
6.2.4: Added: Update based on toolset types number and text field
6.2.5: Added: Menu import and export support
6.2.6: Added: Support for Widgets import and export (Posts,Pages,Comments,Categories and Archives)
6.2.7: Added: Comments import with pods fields
6.2.8: Fixed: CSV headers with whitespace issue
6.2.9: Fixed: Non extension xml url support
6.2.11: Updated existing user password based on email while import

6.3.0: Added: Update based on PODS text and number fields (Posts,Pages,Custom Posts,WC-Products)

6.3.2: Added: Update support for the images

6.3.5: Fixed: Drag and drop post content with HTML attributes
